1.9.4.1.2.0: Added Battle Axes and Minor Changes
1.9.4.1.2.1: Added Recipes for the Battle Axes
1.9.4.1.4.0: Now it requires ArmorPlus to work
1.9.4.1.5.0: Added some Configuration settings and some information in the mod's config folder
1.9.4.1.6.0: Minor Changes, added French Support Required ArmorPlus 2.1.0 or later
1.9.4.1.7.0: Rebalanced some weapons and Fixed Item Models in third person not rendering properly
